sentence.Network_en: Singable melody is the essence of music.
sentence.Network_cn: 可唱的曲调是音乐的本质.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...完整的中译本，我最后决定以这两个中译本为基础完成这个歌词全文的中文意译本。不过如果能有更简明和可唱(singable)的华语版 …
20个以able结尾的单词_百度知道 ... 可租的 rentable 可唱的 singable 可解的 solvable.
singa 辛加, singable 适合于歌唱的, singable 可吟诵的
sing 进步, singable 可吟诵的, singa 辛加

sentences.sentence: "singable melody is the essence of music"- Winthrop Sargeant

auth_sentence.content: With its minimalist riffs and Hebrew inflections, Dove's music stayed singable, clear and catchy.
